name: Cabernet Sauvignon
additional_information: Full-bodied red grape with high tannins, dark fruit flavors, and excellent aging potential.

name: Merlot
additional_information: Soft, approachable red grape with plum and cherry flavors.

name: Pinot Noir
additional_information: Light-bodied red grape known for elegance, red fruit, and high acidity.

name: Syrah
additional_information: Bold red grape with pepper, spice, and dark fruit characteristics.

name: Zinfandel
additional_information: Rich, fruit-forward red grape with jammy flavors and high alcohol.

name: Malbec
additional_information: Deep-colored grape with blackberry flavors and smooth tannins.

name: Sangiovese
additional_information: High-acid red grape with cherry and earthy notes.

name: Tempranillo
additional_information: Medium to full-bodied grape with plum, leather, and tobacco notes.

name: Nebbiolo
additional_information: High tannin and acidity with floral aromas and long aging potential.

name: Grenache
additional_information: Fruit-driven grape with strawberry and spice flavors.

name: Mourvèdre
additional_information: Earthy, structured grape often used in blends.

name: Barbera
additional_information: High-acid grape with juicy red fruit flavors.

name: Carménère
additional_information: Herbal, spicy red grape now famous in Chile.

name: Gamay
additional_information: Light-bodied, fresh red grape with bright fruit flavors.

name: Tannat
additional_information: Highly tannic grape producing powerful wines.

name: Pinotage
additional_information: Cross of Pinot Noir and Cinsault with smoky, fruity notes.

name: Touriga Nacional
additional_information: Intense, aromatic grape central to Port wine.

name: Cinsault
additional_information: Low-tannin grape often used in blends and rosé.

name: Dolcetto
additional_information: Soft red grape with dark fruit and low acidity.

name: Montepulciano
additional_information: Widely planted grape producing smooth, dark wines.

name: Negroamaro
additional_information: Bitter-sweet red grape with dark fruit notes.

name: Bobal
additional_information: High-acid grape with deep color.

name: Alicante Bouschet
additional_information: Teinturier grape with red flesh.

name: Primitivo
additional_information: Ripe, powerful grape genetically identical to Zinfandel.

name: Lagrein
additional_information: Dark, structured grape with blackberry flavors.

name: Xinomavro
additional_information: High-acid grape often compared to Nebbiolo.

name: Frappato
additional_information: Light, aromatic red grape with floral notes.

name: Mencía
additional_information: Fresh red grape with mineral and red fruit character.

name: Blaufränkisch
additional_information: Spicy, high-acid red grape.

name: Chardonnay
additional_information: Versatile white grape ranging from crisp to richly oaked.

name: Sauvignon Blanc
additional_information: High-acid grape with citrus and herbal notes.

name: Riesling
additional_information: Aromatic grape capable of dry to sweet styles.

name: Pinot Grigio
additional_information: Light-bodied grape with pear and citrus flavors.

name: Chenin Blanc
additional_information: High-acid grape used for dry, sweet, and sparkling wines.

name: Viognier
additional_information: Floral grape with peach and apricot aromas.

name: Sémillon
additional_information: Rich grape often blended with Sauvignon Blanc.

name: Muscat
additional_information: Highly aromatic grape with floral and grape notes.

name: Gewürztraminer
additional_information: Spicy, aromatic grape with lychee aromas.

name: Albariño
additional_information: Crisp white grape with citrus and saline notes.

name: Grüner Veltliner
additional_information: Peppery white grape with high acidity.

name: Vermentino
additional_information: Fresh white grape with herbal and citrus notes.

name: Trebbiano
additional_information: High-yield grape used widely across Europe.

name: Fiano
additional_information: Textured white grape with nutty aromas.

name: Garganega
additional_information: Main grape of Soave wines.

name: Viura
additional_information: Fresh white grape also known as Macabeo.

name: Picpoul
additional_information: High-acid grape with citrus freshness.

name: Torrontés
additional_information: Highly aromatic white grape.

name: Marsanne
additional_information: Full-bodied white grape with nutty notes.

name: Roussanne
additional_information: Aromatic grape with floral and herbal character.
